metadata.title: CVE-2016-7982 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in ecrire/exec/valider_xml.php in SPIP 3.1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to enumerate the files on the system via the var_url parameter in a valider_xml action.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-1').
